title: Derivative of product of two functions graphically

content.question: The graphs of two differentiable functions f and g are shown above. Given <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>p</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGWbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp caWGMbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaWGNbWaae Waa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@41D7@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> which of the following statements about <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>p</mi> <mo>′</mo> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qaceWGWbGbauaadaqadaWdaeaapeGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaa wMcaaaaa@3A68@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> is true?

choices.label: There is not enough information given to conclude anything about <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>p</mi> <mo>′</mo> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qaceWGWbGbauaadaqadaWdaeaapeGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaa wMcaaaaa@3A68@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>.
